price: Dájúdájú èyí, òhun ni ìtàn òdodo. Àti pé kò sí ọlọ́hun kan tí a gbọ́dọ̀ jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo àyàfi Allāhu. Dájúdájú Allāhu, Òun ni Alágbára, Ọlọ́gbọ́n.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلۡقَصَصُ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lahuwa al-qaṣaṣu al-ḥaqu wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
